categories: Category:The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook recipes

nodes.text: Moof milk yogurt was a variety of purple-colored yogurt made with moof milk, a type of milk that was produced by creatures called moofs. Artiodac chef Strono Tuggs recommended it for his Roasted Kajaka Root recipe, which was pictured with a yogurt topping in The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook, a cookbook he published sometime after the Battle of Takodana in 34 ABY. The dish was made with kajaka root topped with a blend of moof milk yogurt, honey, nut butter, and a cooking spice.

Moof milk yogurt was introduced in the recipe for Roasted Kajaka Root in the 2019 cookbook Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge: The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook, which was written by Marc Sumerak and Chelsea Monroe-Cassel.
